mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Jefferson praises Morse on the latter's geography text; suggests adding a section on the produce or trade goods of each area; points out the omission of the College of William & Mary in the text, an institution that has "furnished constantly ... its full quota of distinguished characters."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1823 March 09, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia], to Sidney Morse, New Haven, [Connecticut].
